body:
Hi everyone!

Playing against Zoe at the moment can be really frustrating  but playing as her is really fun (most of the time :D).
There are 2 things I would really love to change in her kit: 

1. Portal Jump

If Zoe gets rootet/knockuped after blinking to the target position she sould stay at this position till the end of the root
and blink backwards after the root duration. 

This adds simply more counterplay options and Zoe has to think of it before going in. 

2. Sleepy Trouble Bubble

If Zoe miss this skillshot the field should slow the opponent on it (the field is getting you tired) instead of the same effect as hitting the skill. 

The zoning effect is really really powerful and sometimes it is better to miss this ability. If you hit someone you should get rewarded more than missing.

Both suggestions (although you labeled them both '1' :P) are good. Better than the normal arguments for straight nerfs.

Her E is always going to be an issue based on it's design, a skill shot, which range can be extended if thrown through walls which slows for 1.4 seconds then stuns for 2.25 seconds, totalling 3.65 seconds of CC. If you miss it, it leaves a zoning trap which if stepped on starts the same 1.4 then 2.25 seconds process. Plus can be shot from through a wall 1000 unit away or point blank and it does the same thing. Plus the damage and true damage enhancement. That's a lot. (It used to also have a cooldown reduction on hit).

Rewarding her for missing her skill shot with the same duration stun because of a massive trap kind of make it feel too forgiving when you compare it to Xerath's stun or Morgana's Q.

Change you suggested seems like a fair balance, the 'trap' will only make you drowsy but make it last like 2 seconds up from the 1.4, so at least you have time to get a Q shot in.
